page.title: 08HEALTH
page.content: {GIRVAN}is well catered for health- wise with its own Cottage Hospital,Day Centre,Health Centre,two dental surgeries and Ambulance Depot. Many Girvan residents were born in the Davidson Hospital and now attend the Day Care Centre as elderly patients.Accident cases and sudden illnesses are dealt with along with routine nursing.Many of Girvan's people have reason to be grateful to the staff of this establishment. The Health Centre provides a focus for doctors and patients although some older patients regret the rather less personal touch. Three dentists practise in town and the lengthy wait for an appointment bears witness to their necessity.The Ambulance attends accidents and takes senior citizens to Day Care.
